page.title: 16Traffic in Highworth.
page.content: Highworth is on the A361 which goes north from Swindon towards Lechlade. We carried out traffic counts at the junction of the A361 with the Highworth High Street at every hour during one day. The main rush hours are between 7am and 8am, and between 5pm and 6.30pm. The quietest time is at 2pm. Only 20% of the traffic on the A361 turns into the High Street ; the rest passes through the town. Most people of Highworth would like the town to have a by-pass. Also they think that the roads should be improved, the number of lorries reduced and a subway built under the A361.
